msg.msgText: "Topic" monitoring data, can be obtained using the "imaserver stat Topic" command. SYNTAX: imaserver stat Topic help imaserver stat Topic ["TopicString=value"] ["ResultCount=value"] "StatType=value" ["FilePrefix=value"] EXAMPLE: imaserver stat Topic "TopicString=topic01" "ResultCount=50" "StatType=SubscriptionsHighest" The valid options are: TopicString Topic name. Asterisk matches 0 or more characters. The default value is *. ResultCount Number of returned results. The valid options are 10,25,50,100,All. The default value is 25. If "All" is specified, StatType is ignored and an un-sorted list is returned. StatType The sort order in which results will be returned. Specify from one of the following StatTypes: The default StatType is "PublishedMsgsHighest" PublishedMsgsHighest PublishedMsgsLowest SubscriptionsHighest SubscriptionsLowest RejectedMsgsHighest RejectedMsgsLowest FailedPublishesHighest FailedPublishesLowest FilePrefix The prefix of the .CSV file that the result is saved to. The file name contains the prefix, process ID, and timestamp. If FilePrefix is not specified, then the result is displayed on the console. NOTES: 1. Options are specified as "key=value" pairs. 2. All "Key=value" pair must be enclosed within double quotation marks.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
